title: Vacation!
description: Join the newly minted mage Hexer Stoze on his exploration of the wide world after an arduous and dangerous magickal education. If there's trouble, Hexer's guaranteed to find it. That is, if he doesn't cause it in the first place.  Elves of Faery and Demons of the Hells, Dark Necromancer's with nefarious plans and a shining Lady of Goodness all come together to help the young warlock and his unlooked for friend Virginia enjoy a MOST memorable vacation in the Outlands.  Warning! magick inside!
author: Kelly L White
